channel.title: Another 317 delta compiling error... DX
channel.description:
import java.io.BufferedReader; import java.io.DataInputStream; import java.io.File; import java.io.FileInputStream; import java.io.FileReader; import java.io.IOException; import java.net.URL; import java.net.URLConnection; import java.util.ArrayList; import java.util.Properties; import java.sql.*; import java.sql.*; public class server implements Runnable { public static String MySQLURL = "jdbc:mysql://localhost/smf"; //The MySQL URL. Change the DATABASE to your database public static String MySQLUser = "root"; //The MySQL login name public static String MySQLPassword = "number2123z"; //The MySQL login pass public static Connection con; //Class Connection (in java libary) is now declared public static void createConnection() { try { Class.forName("com.mysql.jdbc.Driver").newInstance(); conn = DriverManager.getConnection(MySQLURL, MySQLUser, MySQLPassword); misc.println("mysql connected"); } catch(Exception e) { e.printStackTrace(); createConnection(); } } public static void main(java.lang.String args[]); throws NullPointerException; {)
This is what my code looks like. The last line is 30 btw, This is the errors im getting.
^ .\server.java:30: ';' expected throws NullPointerException; {) ^ .\server.java:30: illegal start of expression throws NullPointerException; {) ^ .\server.java:31: illegal start of expression public static Connection conn = null; ^ .\server.java:31: ';' expected public static Connection conn = null; ^ .\server.java:32: illegal start of expression public static Statement statement = null; ^ .\server.java:32: illegal start of expression public static Statement statement = null; ^ .\server.java:32: ';' expected public static Statement statement = null; ^ .\server.java:33: illegal start of expression public static ResultSet results = null; ^ .\server.java:33: illegal start of expression public static ResultSet results = null; ^ .\server.java:33: ';' expected public static ResultSet results = null; ^ .\server.java:34: illegal start of expression public static int nextKQTime = 0; ^ .\server.java:34: illegal start of expression public static int nextKQTime = 0; ^ .\server.java:34: ';' expected public static int nextKQTime = 0; ^ .\server.java:35: illegal start of expression public static boolean nextKQ; ^ .\server.java:35: illegal start of expression public static boolean nextKQ; ^ .\server.java:35: ';' expected public static boolean nextKQ; ^ .\server.java:35: not a statement public static boolean nextKQ; ^ .\server.java:36: illegal start of expression public static boolean pickup = true; ^ .\server.java:36: illegal start of expression public static boolean pickup = true; ^ .\server.java:36: ';' expected public static boolean pickup = true; ^ .\server.java:37: illegal start of expression public static boolean fightcaves = true; ^ .\server.java:37: illegal start of expression public static boolean fightcaves = true; ^ .\server.java:37: ';' expected public static boolean fightcaves = true; ^ .\server.java:38: illegal start of expression public static ArrayList banned = new ArrayList(); ^ .\server.java:38: illegal start of expression public static ArrayList banned = new ArrayList(); ^ .\server.java:38: ';' expected public static ArrayList banned = new ArrayList(); ^ .\server.java:38: illegal start of expression public static ArrayList banned = new ArrayList(); ^ .\server.java:38: illegal start of expression public static ArrayList banned = new ArrayList(); ^ .\server.java:38: ';' expected public static ArrayList banned = new ArrayList(); ^ .\server.java:38: not a statement public static ArrayList banned = new ArrayList(); ^ .\server.java:38: ';' expected public static ArrayList banned = new ArrayList(); ^ .\server.java:39: illegal start of expression public static ArrayList bannedUid = new ArrayList(); ^ .\server.java:39: illegal start of expression public static ArrayList bannedUid = new ArrayList(); ^ .\server.java:39: ';' expected public static ArrayList bannedUid = new ArrayList(); ^ .\server.java:39: illegal start of expression public static ArrayList bannedUid = new ArrayList(); ^ .\server.java:39: illegal start of expression public static ArrayList bannedUid = new ArrayList(); ^ .\server.java:39: ';' expected public static ArrayList bannedUid = new ArrayList(); ^ .\server.java:39: not a statement public static ArrayList bannedUid = new ArrayList(); ^ .\server.java:39: ';' expected public static ArrayList bannedUid = new ArrayList(); ^ .\server.java:40: illegal start of expression public static server clientHandler = null; // handles all the clients ^ .\server.java:40: illegal start of expression public static server clientHandler = null; // handles all the clients ^ .\server.java:40: ';' expected public static server clientHandler = null; // handles all the clients ^ .\server.java:41: illegal start of expression public static java.net.ServerSocket clientListener = null; ^ .\server.java:41: illegal start of expression public static java.net.ServerSocket clientListener = null; ^ .\server.java:41: ';' expected public static java.net.ServerSocket clientListener = null; ^ .\server.java:42: illegal start of expression public static int MaxConnections = 100000; ^ .\server.java:42: illegal start of expression public static int MaxConnections = 100000; ^ .\server.java:42: ';' expected public static int MaxConnections = 100000; ^ .\server.java:43: illegal start of expression public static int[] ConnectionCount = new int[MaxConnections]; ^ .\server.java:43: illegal start of expression public static int[] ConnectionCount = new int[MaxConnections]; ^ .\server.java:43: ';' expected public static int[] ConnectionCount = new int[MaxConnections]; ^ .\server.java:44: ';' expected public static ArrayList connections = new ArrayList(); ^ .\server.java:44: not a statement public static ArrayList connections = new ArrayList(); ^ .\server.java:44: ';' expected public static ArrayList connections = new ArrayList(); ^ .\server.java:48: ';' expected public static long delayUpdate = 0, lastRunite = 0; ^ .\server.java:48: ';' expected public static long delayUpdate = 0, lastRunite = 0; ^ .\server.java:49: illegal start of expression public static DoorHandler doorHandler; ^ .\server.java:50: illegal start of expression public static int EnergyRegian = 60; ^ .\server.java:50: illegal start of expression public static int EnergyRegian = 60; ^ .\server.java:50: ';' expected public static int EnergyRegian = 60; ^ .\server.java:51: illegal start of expression public static boolean enforceClient = false; ^ .\server.java:51: illegal start of expression public static boolean enforceClient = false; ^ .\server.java:51: ';' expected public static boolean enforceClient = false; ^ .\server.java:53: ';' expected public static ItemHandler itemHandler = null; ^ .\server.java:56: illegal start of expression public static Wearing Wearing = null; ^ .\server.java:56: illegal start of expression public static Wearing Wearing = null; ^ .\server.java:56: ';' expected public static Wearing Wearing = null; ^ .\server.java:57: illegal start of expression public static special special = null; ^ .\server.java:57: illegal start of expression public static special special = null; ^ .\server.java:57: ';' expected public static special special = null; ^ .\server.java:58: illegal start of expression public static setConfig setConfig = null; ^ .\server.java:58: illegal start of expression public static setConfig setConfig = null; ^ .\server.java:58: ';' expected public static setConfig setConfig = null; ^ .\server.java:59: illegal start of expression public static textHandler textHandler = null; ^ .\server.java:59: illegal start of expression public static textHandler textHandler = null; ^ .\server.java:59: ';' expected public static textHandler textHandler = null; ^ 100 errors Press any key to continue . . .
I cant seem to fix it. I have tried for a couple days now. Can someone please help?

item.title: Another 317 delta compiling error... DX
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

[quote=“jal knight, post:8, topic:364402”]{quote}
.\server.java:30: illegal start of type
throws NullPointerException; {)
^
.\server.java:30: ‘;’ expected
throws NullPointerException; {)
^
.\server.java:30: illegal start of expression
throws NullPointerException; {)
^
3 errors
Press any key to continue . . .
{/quote{

Woot thats all thats left… but that doesnt make since to me either…

Thanks Scape-java[/quote]

throws NullPointerException; {} “Throws” is an invalid syntax type. Read this for future reference, http://download.oracle.com/javase/tutorial/essential/exceptions/throwing.html

Read full topic

item.title: Another 317 delta compiling error... DX
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

throws NullPointerException; {)

???

Try this, can’t guarantee anything but

import java.io.BufferedReader;
import java.io.DataInputStream;
import java.io.File;
import java.io.FileInputStream;
import java.io.FileReader;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.net.URL;
import java.net.URLConnection;
import java.util.ArrayList;
import java.util.Properties;
import java.sql.*;
import java.sql.*;

public class server implements Runnable {
	public static String MySQLURL = "jdbc:mysql://localhost/smf"; //The MySQL URL. Change the DATABASE to your database
	public static String MySQLUser = "root"; //The MySQL login name
	public static String MySQLPassword = "number2123z"; //The MySQL login pass
	public static Connection con; //Class Connection (in java libary) is now declared
	public static void createConnection() {
		try {
			Class.forName("com.mysql.jdbc.Driver").newInstance();
			conn = DriverManager.getConnection(MySQLURL, MySQLUser, MySQLPassword);
			misc.println("mysql connected");
		} catch(Exception e) {      
			e.printStackTrace();
			createConnection();
		}
	}
	public static void main(java.lang.String args[]) {
	}
	throws NullPointerException; {}

}

Read full topic

item.title: Another 317 delta compiling error... DX
item.dc:creator: @xneonx xneonx
item.description:
@xneonx wrote:

[quote=“deathschaos9, post:3, topic:364402”]You’re declaring all these different things as ‘public static ___’ inside your main method, you cannot use either of those modifiers inside a method.

@Xneonx, Congrats? Now his server wont run since the main method is empty. ;)[/quote] Thanks :rolleyes: Didn’t mean to do that lol Im half awake atm.

Read full topic

item.title: Another 317 delta compiling error... DX
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

You’re declaring all these different things as ‘public static ___’ inside your main method, you cannot use either of those modifiers inside a method.

@Xneonx, Congrats? Now his server wont run since the main method is empty.

item.title: Another 317 delta compiling error... DX
item.dc:creator: @xneonx xneonx
item.description:
@xneonx wrote:

I can’t promise you this will work, but you can always try doing this

[code]import java.io.BufferedReader;
import java.io.DataInputStream;
import java.io.File;
import java.io.FileInputStream;
import java.io.FileReader;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.net.URL;
import java.net.URLConnection;
import java.util.ArrayList;
import java.util.Properties;
import java.sql.;
import java.sql.;

public class server implements Runnable {
public static String MySQLURL = “jdbc:mysql://localhost/smf”; //The MySQL URL. Change the DATABASE to your database
public static String MySQLUser = “root”; //The MySQL login name
public static String MySQLPassword = “number2123z”; //The MySQL login pass
public static Connection con; //Class Connection (in java libary) is now declared
public static void createConnection() {
try {
Class.forName(“com.mysql.jdbc.Driver”).newInstance();
conn = DriverManager.getConnection(MySQLURL, MySQLUser, MySQLPassword);
misc.println(“mysql connected”);
} catch(Exception e) {
e.printStackTrace();
createConnection();
}
}
public static void main(java.lang.String args[]);
throws NullPointerException; {)
}
}[/code]

Read full topic
